After about 10 minutes, you slowly rub her stomach. Suddenly, her hand comes down and grabs you. She brings you up to her face. "She is sleep moving!" You think. Kirlia stats licking you.
"You can't escape me, my little treat." She mumble in her sleep. You decide to try and wake her because you don't want her to eat you while she is still asleep. You call her name. "Don't try to persuade me, you won't get away from your fate." She mumbles. Her mouth opens. You try to call out to her one more time. Kirlia . . .
15123.title: The Dreaming Kirlia

151231.content:
Kirlia stirs and then opens her eyes. By the time she woke up, half of your body was stuck in between her lips. She pulls you out and looks at you.

"Hey what happened?" You explain the answer to her question. "Oh I'm sorry. I guess I'm still hungry." You smile.

"Hey, you still have a tasty snack, right?" She looks at you for a moment, then remembers why you were tiny. "Just remember, think of me as food, not a friend. I don't want you to hold back." You say.

"Don't worry, that won't be a problem." Kirlia dangles you and licks her lips. She opens her mouth and. Rings you over it. You can see her sharp teeth and massive tongue. She lowers you enough that your hands were in her mouth. She bites them off and swallows. "You are good, better than any treat I ever had." She lets go, making you fall into her open mouth. Her lips close, trapping you inside. You can do much as she swirls you around. She swallows you whole. When you land in her stomach, you felt a little weird inside.

"Thank you, we should do that again." You tell her.

"Of course we will. You're too tasty to only eat once. For now though, stay in my stomach like a good snack." Kirlia decides to take you . . .
151231.title: The live snack

choices: Decide to wait for Kirlia to wake up
151232.content:
Just as you call out Kirlia's name once more, she quickly releases her fingers causing you to plummet to the awaiting abyss below. While you were looking forward to getting eaten by her, you didn't expect to do it during her sleeping. With a loud *Splat* your form soon lands upon the squishy wet surface of her huge tongue. As you raise your head up at the outside light, your whole entire view is quickly shrouded in darkness as her lips close before you. Alone in her mouth, you try your best to kneel up as a small pool of her saliva forms around your knees. her hot humid breath blows behind your bare back almost giving an assuring yet pleasing sensation. As the hot wind blew in rhythmic bursts, the faint scent of her breath fills your nostrils. Oddly enough, her breath carried the aroma of something sweet, almost like sugar mixed with fruit.

As you were about to clamber upon the surface of her tongue, you soon find yourself losing balance as the mighty muscle below you suddenly begins to wiggle. In no time, you soon find yourself getting sloshed about the slippery surface as Kirlia begins to move her tongue about. As your body slip and slid all about her huge tongue, there were several moments when you found the it curling around your body. Judging by the satisfied "mmm's" emanating down Kirlia's throat, it was clear she was enjoying your flavor. After a few seconds of being jostled about in her maw, even being pinned upon the roof of her mouth, her tongue soon begins to calm down it's motions. Upon lying on the slippery muscle, exhausted from all the movements, you soon find your surroundings begin to change in gravity. Your once stable plane begins to shift upwards as Kirlia begins to lift her tongue up.

Due to the slipperiness of the muscle, it seemed impossible to keep a steady grip. As your heart races from the sudden occurrences around you, you quickly remember the reason you were in here in the first place. While it was indeed tense to say the least, you soon take a deep breath and begin to loosen your grip allowing gravity to do it's job. The descent down was speedy, almost as if travelling down a steep waterslide at an amusement park. A small chuckle somehow manages to escape as you descended by just how entertaining the trip down was.

After a second or two of sliding, you soon find yourself free falling for a brief moment before plummeting downwards. Upon falling, your body was soon caught by the squishy surface of her throat muscles as a loud *GULP* sounds off around you. In no time, the wiggling walls around you begin to pull you downwards, shaking all about your body in a sporadic pattern. A small groan escapes your mouth by the odd yet pleasing feeling that the walls were producing as you continue your trek downwards. During your trip, the rhythmic beats of her heart soon pass on by as you seemed o have made it past her chest area. After around a pure minute of being massaged by the wriggling masses of flesh that was Kirlia's throat, your feet soon stumble upon a rather tight area.

With a loud *Squelch* and *Slorp* you soon feel your feet being sucked down past the tight mass of flesh. Upon feeling this, a great shudder courses down your body seeing as how you never once experienced a feeling like this before. Soon enough, the tight mass begins to suck up to your knees as you begin to feel your feet now free from the slimy tunnel. Within a matter of moments, your whole body but your head was past the narrow area. Below you could feel your body freely dangle about as you desperately try to pull your way down. Your persistence soon ends up paying off as you slide on through and begin to free fall within the depths of what seemed to be Kirlia's belly.

As you descend within the huge pink chamber, a loud splash erupts as you land straight into the greenish liquids of Kirlia's digestive juices. Not wasting time, you quickly swim your way up before popping your head out onto the surface. Drenched, you begin to float about as the sounds of gurgles and groans surround the area. Above, you manage to spot the faint beats of her heart as you soon revert your attention around you. Not too far off appeared to be a remnant of the hotdog she ate not too long ago. Without hesitation, you swim your way up to it before clambering upon the makeshift canoe with quick haste. Now out of the acid, you swipe off some of the dripping juices clinging to your form before gazing about the pulsating walls of Kirlia's tummy. A small smile begins to emerge on your face seeing as how you managed to successfully make it inside of the Pokémon's belly.

Just as you were about to revel in your accomplishment however, you soon begin to realize something. Will Kirlia even notice she ate you when she woke up? As you begin to ponder the thought, another idea soon begins to emerge. With you now inside her, you could possibly take the opportunity to explore her insides while she's still asleep. As you float upon the hotdog, you begin to wonder just what course of actions to take.
151232.title: Journey to the center of Kirlia

choices: Try to get her attention anyways
She notices you before you can do anything
153.content: The spiderweb was made from a Joltik and you struggled to get down. Things kept shaking and you notice Kirlia was walking. She apparently didn't notice the web because she walked right into it. The Joltik fell on her head, while you were in her breasts. She didn't seem to notice you, probably because she was too focused on the Joltik. She knocked it off and used psychic, knocking it unconscious. She continued her walk with you in her boobs. You were a little worried now because if she didn't realize that you weren't a Pokemon, she probably would attack you. After little thought, you decided to . . .
153.title: From a sticky spot to a nicer spot
